attributes.additional_details:
Close non essential construction sites.
Construction companies to receive grants to pay their workers 80% of their salaries
attributes.background: Construction workers are still required to go to work during the Covid-19 pandemic. With many on site, it is difficult for them to work 2 metres apart. They are at risk of catching Covid-19. Workers feel pressured to go to work as they are concerned they will not be paid if they stay at home
